content: this easy suzette stitch dishcloth pattern delivers straightforward instructions on how to crochet suzette stitch dishcloths make them striped or solid either way you ll have new dishcloths you love this listing is for a downloadable pdf of a crochet pattern only you will not receive a physical product skill level easy finished size approximately 10 25 x 10 25 hook size us size 7 4 5 mm yarn category 4 worsted weight main stitches single_crochet double_crochet chain the pattern uses us crochet terms and is available only in english please note that this pattern is available for free on stitching-together com 1 the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy-to-read printable and ad-free version of the pattern 1 https //www stitching-together com/suzette-stitch-dishcloth/
